class WebinarApiService{constructor(){this.baseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_FUNCTIONS_URL||'http://localhost:5001/your-project/us-central1';}async createRazorpayOrder(orderData){const resp=await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/createOrder`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(orderData)});if(!resp.ok)throw new Error('Failed to create order');return resp.json();}async verifyRazorpayPayment(paymentData){const resp=await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/verifyPayment`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(paymentData)});if(!resp.ok)throw new Error('Verification failed');return resp.json();}// Legacy methods for backward compatibility
async createOrder(_ref){let{baseUrl,registrationId,amount}=_ref;const resp=await fetch(`${baseUrl}/createOrder`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({registrationId,amount})});if(!resp.ok)throw new Error('Failed to create order');return resp.json();}async verifyPayment(_ref2){let{baseUrl,registrationId,razorpay_order_id,razorpay_payment_id,razorpay_signature}=_ref2;const resp=await fetch(`${baseUrl}/verifyPayment`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({registrationId,razorpay_order_id,razorpay_payment_id,razorpay_signature})});if(!resp.ok)throw new Error('Verification failed');return resp.json();}}export const webinarApi=new WebinarApiService();
